name: Memory Serves
description:
MEMORY SERVES

A short narrative platformer about exploring in the dark and finding lost memories.

Headphones recomended!

This game was made for the Campfire Jam 2021

CONTROLS

- Click the left mouse button to throw your torch towards the mouse -

- A and D or Arrow Keys to move -

- Space bar to Jump -

CREDITS

- Yiran Ma: Music Composer / Narrative Writer -

- Marina Manzari-Li Causi: Visual Artist / Vocals -

- Harrison C Parker: Gameplay Designer / Programmer -

- Emily Freda Sharp: Narrative Editor -
